products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout Butter Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Introduce elegant creams into your space with their blackout butter cream roller blind. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout butter cream roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.

products.title: Konya Blackout Butter Cream
products.description: Konya blackout butter cream plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Palate Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric.
